languages.text: "Нет!" {n}Тяжело дыша, Кассия прикрывает глаза ладонью. Тонкие пальцы огибает алая дорожка слезы.{/n} "Столь гнилостных, ржавых красок не существует... Это безумие, ложь. Насмешка!"

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Нет! Столь чудовищных красок не существует... Это безумие, ложь, насмешка! Не смотрю, не вижу, не верю..." {n}Тяжело дыша, Кассия прикрывает око дрожащими ладонями. Тонкие пальцы огибает алая дорожка слезы.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers her eyes with her hand as crimson tears seep through her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"
languages.original_text: "Нет!" {n}Тяжело дыша, Кассия прикрывает глаза ладонью. Тонкие пальцы огибает алая дорожка слезы.{/n} "Столь гнилостных, ржавых красок не существует... Это безумие, ложь. Насмешка!"

traits.locale_text: "No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers one of her eyes with both hands, crimson tears seeping around her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"

"No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers her eyes with her hand as crimson tears seep through her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"

"No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers her eyes with her hand as crimson tears seep through her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"

languages.text: "Nein!" {n}Cassia bedeckt schwer atmend ihre Augen mit der Hand, und eine rote Tränenspur windet sich um ihre dünnen, zitternden Finger.{/n} "Solche faulen, rostigen Farben kann es nicht geben ... Alles Wahnsinn und Lügen. Eine Verhöhnung!"
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers her eyes with her hand as crimson tears seep through her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"

traits.locale_text: "Nein!" {n}Cassia bedeckt schwer atmend ihre Augen mit der Hand, und eine rote Tränenspur windet sich um ihre dünnen, zitternden Finger.{/n} "Solche faulen, rostigen Farben kann es nicht geben ... Alles Wahnsinn und Lügen. Eine Verhöhnung!"

languages.text: « Non ! {n}Cassia halète et se cache les yeux de sa main tandis que des larmes écarlates coulent entre ses doigts fins et tremblants.{/n} Des couleurs aussi affreuses ne peuvent pas exister... Je ne perçois que de la folie et du mensonge. C'est affreux ! »
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers her eyes with her hand as crimson tears seep through her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"

traits.locale_text: « Non ! {n}Cassia halète et se cache les yeux de sa main tandis que des larmes écarlates coulent entre ses doigts fins et tremblants.{/n} Des couleurs aussi affreuses ne peuvent pas exister... Je ne perçois que de la folie et du mensonge. C'est affreux ! »

languages.text: “不要！”{n}卡西娅喘着粗气，紧紧捂着自己的眼睛。她的手指不住颤抖着，鲜红的血泪从指缝中流了出来。{/n}“如此腐朽的颜色怎么可能存在……一切都是谎言，是疯狂！这太扭曲了！”
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers her eyes with her hand as crimson tears seep through her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"

traits.locale_text: “不要！”{n}卡西娅喘着粗气，紧紧捂着自己的眼睛。她的手指不住颤抖着，鲜红的血泪从指缝中流了出来。{/n}“如此腐朽的颜色怎么可能存在……一切都是谎言，是疯狂！这太扭曲了！”
“不要！”{n}卡西娅喘着粗气，双手紧紧捂着一只眼睛。她的手指不住颤抖着，鲜红的血泪从指缝中流了出来。{/n}“如此腐朽的颜色怎么可能存在……一切都是谎言，是疯狂！这太扭曲了！”

languages.text: «¡No!». {n}Con la respiración pesada, Cassia se cubre los ojos con la mano mientras lágrimas carmesí escapan entre sus dedos delgados y temblorosos.{/n} «Es imposible que existan colores tan putrefactos y oxidados... No es más que locura y mentiras. ¡Una farsa!».
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers her eyes with her hand as crimson tears seep through her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No!». {n}Con la respiración pesada, Cassia se cubre los ojos con la mano mientras lágrimas carmesí escapan entre sus dedos delgados y temblorosos.{/n} «Es imposible que existan colores tan putrefactos y oxidados... No es más que locura y mentiras. ¡Una farsa!».

languages.text: 「いや！」{n}荒い呼吸をしながら、カシアは手で目を覆った。細く震える指の隙間から深紅の涙がにじみ出た。{/n}「このような腐った、錆びついた色が存在するはずがありません…これは狂気と虚偽の産物です。嘲りなのです！」
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers her eyes with her hand as crimson tears seep through her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"

traits.locale_text: 「いや！」{n}荒い呼吸をしながら、カシアは手で目を覆った。細く震える指の隙間から深紅の涙がにじみ出た。{/n}「このような腐った、錆びついた色が存在するはずがありません…これは狂気と虚偽の産物です。嘲りなのです！」

languages.text: "Hayır!" {n}Derin nefes alıp veren Cassia, titreyen ince parmaklarının arasından kıpkırmızı gözyaşları sızarken elleriyle gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Böylesine çürük, paslı renkler var olamaz... Hepsi delilik ve yalan. Bir oyun bu!"
languages.original_text: "No!" {n}Breathing heavily, Cassia covers her eyes with her hand as crimson tears seep through her thin, trembling fingers.{/n} "Such rotten, rusty colours cannot possibly exist... It's all madness and lies. A mockery!"

traits.locale_text: "Hayır!" {n}Derin nefes alıp veren Cassia, titreyen ince parmaklarının arasından kıpkırmızı gözyaşları sızarken elleriyle gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Böylesine çürük, paslı renkler var olamaz... Hepsi delilik ve yalan. Bir oyun bu!"
